dictionary.desc: This is the data dictionary for MOSLA.
terms: The clause-name is the human readable "title" of a specific clause.

The clause-ID refers to specific language and terms.  This allows companies and users to know which specific type of binding a contract will have.  Note that clauses can change overtime by their version.  This is handled separately in the clause version number
This is the specific implementation of a clause.

clauses.clause-short-desc: Party1 will not resell any data from Party2 for any purpose except for court mandated legal proceedings.
clauses.clause-long-desc: Party1 will not collect any data from Party2 for any purpose except for court mandated legal proceedings. This includes cookies, likeness, user application usage data, personally identifiable user data and related information.

clauses.clause-short-desc: Party1 will maintain regular backups of Party2's data. Recovery procedures are in place for data loss events.
clauses.clause-long-desc: Party1 agrees to perform regular backups of data belonging to Party2 that is stored on Party1's systems. In the event of data loss, Party1 will make commercially reasonable efforts to restore data from the most recent backup. Party1 is not liable for data loss beyond its control.

clauses.clause-short-desc: Party1's total liability under this agreement is limited to the amount paid by Party2 in the last 12 months.
clauses.clause-long-desc: To the maximum extent permitted by law, the total liability of Party1 under this agreement, for any claim whatsoever, shall not exceed the total amount of fees paid by Party2 to Party1 under this agreement during the twelve (12) months preceding the date of the claim.

clauses.clause-short-desc: Party1 may terminate this agreement with 30 days written notice if Party2 breaches terms.
clauses.clause-long-desc: Party1 reserves the right to terminate this agreement and access to the service upon thirty (30) days written notice to Party2 if Party2 is found to be in material breach of any terms of this agreement. Party1 may terminate immediately if the breach is severe or involves illegal activities.

clauses.clause-short-desc: Party2 agrees to pay all fees within 30 days of invoice. Late payments may incur interest.
clauses.clause-long-desc: Party2 agrees to pay all applicable fees for the service as specified in the service order or invoice. Payments are due within thirty (30) days of the invoice date. Late payments may be subject to interest at a rate of 1.5% per month or the maximum rate permitted by law, whichever is lower.

clauses.clause-short-desc: Party1 retains all rights to its pre-existing intellectual property. Party2 retains rights to its data.
clauses.clause-long-desc: Party1 shall retain all rights, title, and interest in and to its pre-existing intellectual property, including the service software, documentation, and trademarks. Party2 shall retain all rights, title, and interest in and to its data provided to Party1. No rights are transferred other than those explicitly granted in this agreement.
